about_the_game:
"PINK ELEPHANT" is an enthralling 2D top-view shooter that will immerse players in a gripping adventure filled with action and mystery. Embark on an epic journey as an unknown hero, daring to challenge the forces of a clandestine underground sect.

The game boasts captivating pixel graphics, adding a nostalgic charm to the overall experience. As players navigate through the enigmatic underground structure, they must skillfully clear each room of formidable adversaries, proving their prowess in combat.

FEATURES
  • Engaging Storyline: Immerse yourself in an enigmatic underground world as an unknown hero challenging a mysterious sect, uncovering secrets with every step.
  • Pixel Art Charm: Enjoy the retro appeal of pixel graphics, adding a nostalgic touch to the thrilling 2D top-view shooter.
  • Diverse Weaponry: Take on enemies using four unique types of weapons, each with distinct strengths and abilities to suit your playstyle.
  • Weapon Upgrade System: Enhance your arsenal by upgrading your weapons, increasing their power and effectiveness in the relentless battles.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Face off against a formidable final boss, testing your skills and tactics to emerge triumphant and unlock a thrilling new game mode.

name: PINK ELEPHANT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\ Vista \ 7 \ 8 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1030
  • Storage: 35 MB available space

short_description: "PINK ELEPHANT" is a 2D top-view shooter with pixel graphics. Play as an unknown hero on a mission to confront an underground sect and clear rooms of enemies. Upgrade weapons, face a final boss, and unlock a new game mode upon victory. Action-packed and engaging!
